msg: Updated MethodMarshaller Implementation to use ParameterDesc information

author: fhanik
msg: Code clean up, last pieces to make is a the KeyAttachment object and the Runnable used for addEvent to be non GC objects, as these events happen very frequently

author: dims
msg: - Ability to specify a relative path for both modules and services (relative to the repo directory)
- Make sure that the relative path is used to load modules.list and services.list
- make sure modules.list is picked up from REPO + MODULES_PATH + modules.list (same for services)
- Fix the path when loading the individual modules and services from modules.list and services.list (had hard coded services/ and modules/)
